Transcription for 996811

He from our prayer might be, He the Lord rest our disloyal,
Come for the Christ, O Lord, He, From our prayer might the praise be.
He from our prayer might be, He, From our prayer might the praise be.
Come, O Lord, and give me praise, Let me fall in Your cross-bred.
Jesus, lover of my soul, Lend me to Thy bosom, Thine,
While the near waters flow, While the camp that still is mine.
Hide me, O my Savior, hide, Fill the storm of my regret,
Save me through the hail and grind, O receive my soul at last.
Come, O Lord, and give me praise, Let me fall in Your cross-bred.
Come, O Lord, and give me praise, Let me fall in Your cross-bred.
He from our prayer might be, He, From our prayer might the praise be.
He from our prayer might be, He, From our prayer might the praise be.
He from our prayer might the praise be.
